PHONE_VERIFICATION.subject: SMS_VERIFICATION
PHONE_VERIFICATION.body: Please you initiated a request to verify your email address. Please use the <%= token %> to verify your email address. If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email. and change your password immediately or contact our support immediately to secure your account.

BUSINESS_PHONE_VERIFICATION.subject: SMS_VERIFICATION
BUSINESS_PHONE_VERIFICATION.body: Please you initiated a request to verify your email address. Please use the <%= token %> to verify your email address. If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email. and change your password immediately or contact our support immediately to secure your account.

MOBILE_FORGOT_PASSWORD.subject: FORGOT_PASSWORD
MOBILE_FORGOT_PASSWORD.body: Please you initiated a request to reset your password . Please use the <%= token %> to reset your password. If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email.  or contact our support immediately to secure your account.
